thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 2 of 171
thread.title: Lisa S.

author: Lisa S.
title: Lisa S.
text:
Could not be more pleased with the sitters we hired on our first use of the site; they beautifully looked after our two precious cats and home for a month while we made a last minute trip abroad to visit a terminally ill family member.
And while we abroad, we had the distinct pleasure to housesit for the kindest couple and their adorable cats, in a town close to our family. All of this came about using the Trusted Housesitters site, and we couldn't be more appreciative of the opportunities this site afforded us. Thank you!
